text: Below is a list of the regiments and corps in the British Army. Some units in the British Army are called a 'regiment' but are the same size as a battalion. Therefore, this is mostly a list of units with their own cap badge. ==Infantry and Armoured Regiments== Infantry Regiments of the British Army Regiment Year Formed Grenadier Guards 1656 Armoured Regiments of the British Army Regiment Year Formed Part of The Life Guards 1922 Household Cavalry Blues and Royals (Royal Horse Guards and 1st Dragoons) 1969 Household Cavalry Category:British Army
title: List of British Army regiments and corps
